column5: 4 bedroom condo, 2 rooms permanently occupied by my sister and I, the other downstairs bedroom in the photos is up for rental. Location is close to Texas A&M making this town home a perfect location when in attendance to any sporting &/or non-sporting events held at the university. This room is equipped with its own FULL bathroom. Also close to, restaurants and dining, family-friendly activities, public transport. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
column8: 4 Bedroom Condo (1 Private Room up for rental)
